# Risk & Compliance â€“ Compliance Rules

## Compliance Requirements
- All regulated activities must be subject to compliance checks.
- Compliance validation must occur before execution where required.
- Violations must be explicitly recorded.

## Enforcement Rules
- Compliance outcomes must be deterministic.
- Overrides require explicit authorization and traceability.

## Forbidden
- Skipping compliance checks
- Silent compliance failures
- Informal exception handling
